Title: (Updated) Facilitator agent to be generally available in Teams meetings
Tags: Updated message, New feature, User impact
Summary: The Facilitator agent is now generally available for Microsoft 365 Copilot-licensed users in Teams meetings, helping organize agendas, track progress, and capture highlights in real time. It integrates with Planner, Word, Loop, and Teams Rooms, and can be enabled by users before or during meetings without requiring recording or transcription.

Title: (Updated) Microsoft Copilot dashboard (in Viva Insights): Adoption metrics for Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
Tags: Updated message, New feature, User impact, Admin impact
Summary: Microsoft is introducing M365 Copilot Chat adoption metrics in the Viva Insights Copilot dashboard, providing detailed usage insights for unlicensed users. Public preview starts late October 2025; GA date is pending feedback. Admins can control or exclude users via VFAM or PowerShell. No action needed to enable.

Title: (Updated) Microsoft 365 Copilot: Content Sources in Copilot Chat
Tags: Updated message, New feature, User impact
Summary: Microsoft 365 Copilot will let licensed users select specific content sources for Copilot Chat responses, enhancing relevance and control. The feature rolls out worldwide from late October to mid-November 2025, is enabled by default, requires no admin action, and does not affect existing policies or compliance.

Title: (Updated) Microsoft 365 Copilot: New Researcher agent output controls
Tags: Updated message, New feature, User impact, Admin impact
Summary: Microsoft 365 Copilot's Researcher Agent now offers customizable report length and multiple export formats, including Word. Rollout starts late September 2025, completing by late October. Features are enabled by default, require no admin action, and support control via Entra ID group membership.

Title: (Updated) Microsoft Copilot in Word: View Document Statistics in Dynamic Document Snapshot
Tags: Updated message, Feature update, User impact
Summary: Microsoft Copilot in Word will add document statistics—author, last modified date, open count—in the Dynamic Document Snapshot's Activity tab. Rolling out worldwide mid-November to late November 2025, this default-on feature requires no admin setup and enhances collaboration by providing key document insights.

Title: (Updated) Microsoft 365 Copilot: New ways to include files and emails as part of prompts in chat web scope
Tags: Updated message, New feature, User impact
Summary: Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat now lets licensed users include files and emails in prompts by typing '/' in the web chat, enhancing prompt relevance. Email access in Outlook starts rolling out October 2025. No admin action is needed; users see only content they have permission to access.

Title: (Updated) Microsoft 365 Copilot: The chat experience will offer better search refinement in the CIQ menu "Files" tab
Tags: Updated message, New feature, User impact
Summary: Microsoft 365 Copilot's chat will soon include "File type" and "People" filters in the CIQ menu's Files tab, enhancing search refinement. This update, rolling out globally from late September to early October 2025, requires no admin action and improves finding relevant files faster.

Title: (Updated) New Tools feature coming to the Microsoft Copilot Chat prompt box
Tags: Updated message, New feature, User impact
Summary: Starting late September 2025, Microsoft Copilot Chat will feature a new Tools button offering easy access to task-specific AI capabilities based on user licenses. This improves feature discoverability and usability, requires no admin setup, and will complete rollout by mid-October 2025.

Title: (Updated) Executable name update for Microsoft 365 Copilot app for Windows
Tags: Updated message, Feature update, User impact, Admin impact
Services: Microsoft 365 suite, Microsoft 365 apps, Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365)
Summary: The Microsoft 365 Copilot app for Windows will update its executable name from Webviewhost.exe to M365Copilot.exe after late September 2025. The change improves clarity for management and does not affect functionality. Organizations with dependencies on the old name should update references accordingly.

Title: Microsoft 365 Copilot Researcher and Microsoft Copilot Studio: Expanding model choice
Tags: Feature update, User impact, Admin impact
Summary: Microsoft 365 Copilot Researcher and Copilot Studio now offer Anthropic models (Claude Opus 4.1 and Sonnet 4) alongside OpenAI models. Admin opt-in is required, with rollout starting September 24, 2025. Anthropic models are in preview, hosted externally, and governed by Anthropic's terms, not Microsoft's.

Title: (Updated) Intelligent Recap Access for Multi-tenant Organization
Tags: Updated message, New feature, User impact
Summary: Copilot users in multi-tenant business-to-business organizations will soon access intelligent meeting recaps from the resource tenant after meetings. Rollout starts early November 2025, completing by late November. No action is needed from admins or users for this update.

Title: Microsoft 365 Copilot: Updates to memory and personalization
Tags: Feature update, User impact, Admin impact
Summary: Microsoft 365 Copilot’s Memory update, rolling out October 2025, uses chat history to personalize responses and offers a redesigned Memory settings page for better user control. Existing admin settings remain unchanged, and no admin action is required unless updating documentation or training.

Title: Microsoft 365 Copilot: AI video creator major update
Tags: New feature, User impact, Admin impact
Summary: Microsoft 365 Copilot's AI video creator is upgraded with transcript-based editing, custom media from OneDrive, natural voices, Brand Kit integration, improved scene structure, and a redesigned interface. Rolling out worldwide from late September to October 2025, it enables easier, professional video creation from documents and text prompts.

Title: Microsoft 365 Copilot: Copilot Chat for Teams Chats, Channels, Calling, and Meetings
Summary: Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat is being integrated side-by-side in Teams Chats, Channels, Calling, and Meetings for licensed users on desktop and web. Public preview starts October for chats and calls, December for meetings, with general availability following. Prior Copilot history remains accessible via the More Options menu.

Title: [Copilot Chat] Upload multiple reference images to create new images
Summary: Users of Copilot Chat in Microsoft 365 will soon be able to upload multiple reference images per session, enhancing image generation. This feature, enabled by default, will roll out globally in late September 2025 with no admin action required. Organizations may update support and documentation accordingly.

Title: (Updated) Viva Engage: Agents in Viva Engage communities Public Preview
Tags: Updated message, New feature, Admin impact
Summary: Viva Engage agents are in Public Preview starting September 18, 2025, allowing community admins to add AI agents that draft answers using community and SharePoint content. SharePoint grounding will enhance answer accuracy by late September. General Availability is planned for early 2026, with admin controls for posting and content access.
